title: 更好的传送门2问题
author: 丿黑色丶痕迹
txt_content:
本帖最后由 丿黑色丶痕迹 于 2013-7-9 16:29 编辑 

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-131314-1-1.html
如果可以使用具体教程是什么？传送门如何制作？为什么我的用mod里的打火石只有声音开不了门？
请大神前来解答！
先多谢！

replies.author: 丿黑色丶痕迹
replies.txt_content:
Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation 
The mods and versions listed below could not be found

EnhancedCore : minimum version required is 0.8

The file 'forgeModLoader-client-0.log' contains more information

replies.author: 丿黑色丶痕迹
replies.txt_content: 有没有人能回答我啊。。。。。。。。我在做地图就卡在这了啊。。。楼梯做起来很复杂的啊。。。
